solution_line_template: Basil gets {morning_fraction} in the morning and {bedtime_fraction} at bedtime so she gets {morning_fraction}+{bedtime_fraction} = <<{morning_fraction}+{bedtime_fraction}={daily_fractional_cookies}>>{daily_fractional_cookies} whole cookie

Basil also gets {daytime_whole_cookies} whole cookies during the day so all total she gets {daytime_whole_cookies}+{daily_fractional_cookies} =<<{daytime_whole_cookies}+{daily_fractional_cookies}={total_daily_cookies}>>{total_daily_cookies} whole cookies

She needs cookies for {number_of_days} days and eats {total_daily_cookies} a day so she needs {number_of_days}*{total_daily_cookies} = <<{number_of_days}*{total_daily_cookies}={total_cookies_needed}>>{total_cookies_needed} cookies

Her cookies come {cookies_per_box} per box and she needs {total_cookies_needed} cookies so she needs {total_cookies_needed}/{cookies_per_box} = <<{total_cookies_needed}/{cookies_per_box}={boxes_needed}>>{boxes_needed} boxes of cookies
